sentences.sContent: A spokesman declined to elaborate on a statement released late yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 发言人拒绝对昨天晚些时候发表的一份声明作出更多说明。

synos.tran: 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的
精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物）

remMethod.val: e(出) + labor(工作) + ate → 辛苦劳动做出来 → 精心制作

words.tran: 苦心经营，精巧；详细阐述

trans.tranOther: carefully planned and organized in great detail
If you elaborate on something that has been said, you say more about it, or give more details
